text: Kandy Falcons (formerly Kandy Warriors, B-Love Kandy, and Kandy Tuskers) is a professional franchise cricket team that plays in the Lanka Premier League (LPL). They were formed in 2020, and represent Sri Lanka's Central Province. The team play their home matches at the Pallekele International Cricket Stadium in the city of Kandy. Playing as B-Love Kandy, they won the 2023 LPL. ==References== Category:Lanka Premier League teams Category:2020 establishments in Sri Lanka
title: Kandy Falcons
